subMenuItems.linkText: EU Digital Services Act - Legal Representative

relatedBlades.title: Certifications and compliance resources
relatedBlades.subtitle: Learn about Cloudflare's adherence to industry-standard security compliance certifications and regulations that help us preserve security and privacy.
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare was built to help you and your customers be more secure on the Internet. Access Cloudflare's compliance documentation through the dashboard.

features.title: ISO 27001:2022
features.description: Implementation of an Information Security Management System (ISMS) and security risk management processes certification.

features.title: ISO 27701:2019
features.description: Implementation of a comprehensive Privacy Information Management system (PIMS) certification.

features.title: ISO 27018:2019
features.description: Extension of an ISMS to protect personal data when being processed in the cloud; privacy certification.

features.title: FedRAMP Moderate
features.description: Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program.

features.title: SOC 2 Type II
features.description: Certification to attest to Security, Confidentiality, and Availability controls in place in accordance to the AICPA Trust Service Criteria.

features.title: PCI DSS 4.0
features.description: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard Attestation of Compliance.

features.title: Global CBPR
features.description: The Global Cross-Border Privacy Rules (Global CBPR) system allows participating organizations to demonstrate compliance with internationally-recognized data protection standards, as a data controller. Cloudflare will certify to the Global CBPR system when organizations can be certified in 2025.

features.title: Global PRP
features.description: The Global Privacy Recognition for Processors (Global PRP) system allows participating organizations to demonstrate compliance with internationally-recognized data protection standards, as a data processor. Cloudflare will certify to the Global PRP system when organizations can be certified in 2025.

features.title: EU Cloud Code of Conduct
features.description: The EU Cloud Code of Conduct is an officially approved GDPR Article 40 Code of Conduct. Read the report [here](https://eucoc.cloud/fileadmin/cloud-coc/files/reports/202403_ReportVerificationtDoA_Cloudflare_2023LVL02SCOPE4316.pdf).

imageAssetFile.altText: EU cloud code of conduct logo
imageAssetFile.title: EU cloud code of conduct logo

contentfulAsset.description: EU cloud code of conduct logo

features.title: Cyber Essentials
features.description: Cloudflare's certificate can be found [here](https://registry.blockmarktech.com/certificates/91f63984-5e18-4780-887a-4409d0950868/).

features.title: C5:2020
features.description: Cloud Computing Compliance Criteria Catalogue (C5:2020) is an auditing standard created by Germany's Federal Office for Information Security (BSI).

features.title: ENS
features.description: Spain National Security framework - Esquema Nacional de Seguridad.

features.title: BSI Qualification
features.description: Cloudflare has been recognized by the German government's Federal Office for Information Security as a qualified provider of DDoS mitigation services. Download this qualification to learn more.

features.title: WCAG 2.1 AA and Section 508
features.description: Cloudflare's dashboard completes Voluntary Product Accessibility Template (VPAT) in compliance with international standards set forth by the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 AA and in conformance with legal standards set forth by Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act.

features.title: 1.1.1.1 Public DNS Resolver Privacy Examination
features.description: Cloudflare conducted a first-of-its-kind privacy examination by a Big Four accounting firm to determine whether the 1.1.1.1 resolver was effectively configured to meet Cloudflare's privacy commitments. See below for more information.
[Japan's Act on the Protection of Personal Information (APPI)](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/appi/)
[Australia's Privacy Act](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/australia-privacy-act/)
[Brazil's General Data Protection Law (LGPD)](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/brazil-lgpd/)
[India's Digital Personal Data Protection Bill (DPDP)](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/india-it-act/)
[General Data Protection Regulations (GDPR)](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/gdpr/)
[Singapore's Personal Protection Act (PDPA)](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/singapore-pdpa/)
[South Korea's Personal Information Protection Act (PIPA)](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/south-korea-pipa/)
[United States Privacy Laws](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/us-privacy-compliance/)
[EU Digital Operational Resilience Act (DORA)](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/compliance-resources/dora/)

features.title: Data confidentiality and availability
features.description: Cloudflare encrypts data by default using the latest protocols, and offers granular control over where encryption keys are stored and where logs are sent.

features.title: Encryption
features.description: Cloudflare's network can encrypt data throughout its journey from origin servers to end-users, using the very latest protocols.

features.title: Data localization
features.description: In many regions — including the EU — Cloudflare lets organizations control which regional data centers their traffic is inspected in and where logs are sent.

features.title: Streamline data compliance
features.description: A composable platform that helps enterprises streamline compliance with extensible security controls across systems that help you connect, protect and build.

relatedBlades.title: Protect and accelerate your websites, apps, and teams.
